data.title: Tigmanshu Dhulia: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Tigmanshu Dhulia: Check out the list of all Tigmanshu Dhulia movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Tigmanshu Dhulia news on Times of India.
data.text:
Ajay Devgn and Tigmanshu Dhulia to collaborate on a film based on the life of Palwankar Baloo, the first Dalit cricket player in India

etimes.in / May 29, 2024, 21:27 (IST)

Film producer Priti Sinha announced on Twitter that she, Ajay Devgn, and Tigmanshu Dhulia are producing a movie that is based on the story of Palwankar Baloo, the first Dalit cricket player in India.

Filmmaker Tigmanshu Dhulia critiques politically driven Indian films, compares 'Kashmir Files' to Nazi propaganda

etimes.in / Feb 28, 2024, 13:02 (IST)

Filmmaker Tigmanshu Dhulia criticizes politically driven Indian films like 'The Kashmir Files,' comparing them to Nazi propaganda. He emphasizes the importance of filmmakers having a clear ideology for impactful cinema and highlights the poor quality due to misguided intentions focused on financial gain.

When Irrfan Khan accused Tigmanshu Dhulia of genocide and shouted at him after a crew member set a beehive on fire

Feb 27, 2024, 16:17 (IST)

Tigmanshu Dhulia opens up about an incident on the set of 'Saheb, Biwi, Gangster Returns' where a beehive was set on fire, causing the death of thousands of bees. Irrfan Khan scolded Tigmanshu for the unfortunate event. Irrfan passed away in 2020 after battling cancer for two years.

Most of the actors today are copying Irrfan Khan, says Tigmanshu Dhulia

PTI / Jan 28, 2024, 14:15 (IST)

Director Tigmanshu Dhulia says many actors are imitating Irrfan Khan's style of acting. Tigmanshu and Irrfan were friends and collaborators since their time at Delhi's National School of Drama. He praised Irrfan's dedication to his work and shared anecdotes about their collaborations on films like 'Haasil', 'Paan Singh Tomar', and 'Saheb, Biwi Aur Gangster Returns'.

219 films, 39 countries, 23 venues: KIFF 2024 set to amp up the celebration of cinema

TNN / Dec 01, 2023, 11:52 (IST)

The 29th Kolkata International Film Festival is set to kick off on December 5 with a star-studded inauguration attended by Salman Khan, Anil Kapoor, Sonakshi Sinha, Mahesh Bhatt, Shatrughan Sinha, Sourav Ganguly, and Aditi Rao Hydari. The festival will pay homage to Gina Lollobrigida, Carlos Saura, Derek Malcolm, Soumendu Roy, and Dariush Mehrjui, who passed away this year. Masterclasses will feature Saurabh Sukhla on acting, Saugata Mukherjee on film production, and Manoj Bajpayee and Sudhir Mishra on acting and direction. The festival is known for its wide array of contemporary cinema and will include a competitive Bengali film segment this year.

Vijay Varma says, ‘I wanted to disappear’ when Tigmanshu Dhulia said THIS about Irrfan Khan

etimes.in / Nov 24, 2023, 14:19 (IST)

Vijay Varma, who is currently riding high on the success of his recently released projects such as 'Jaane Jaan', 'Darlings', 'Lust Stories 2', opened up about the time when he was embarrassed in front of Irrfan Khan, as Tigmanshu Dhulia proclaimed that he would take his place.

'Tum Se Na Ho Payega' phrase existed in our conscience before 'Gangs of Wasseypur': Nitesh Tiwari

PTI / Sep 29, 2023, 11:39 (IST)

Writer-director Nitesh Tiwari's new film, "Tum Se Na Ho Payega," draws its title from the popular catchphrase from "Gangs of Wasseypur." However, Tiwari believes the phrase was already a part of the audience's conscience. The film is a light-hearted take on the challenges faced by today's youth and their dilemma in standing up to societal rules. Tiwari describes the film as a reflection of the flavor and feel of the youth. The film was previously named after the source material, but the title was changed due to deviations from the book's aspects.

Tigmanshu Dhulia opens up about his bond with late actor Irrfan Khan; says 'I have no friend left now'

etimes.in / Aug 06, 2023, 15:26 (IST)

Tigmanshu shared that he joined the National School of Drama in 1986 and Irrfan was in his third year then. The actor added that they both grew in their personal and professional lives together.

Tigmanshu Dhulia’s Instagram account HACKED!; filmmaker calls it 'Useless'

etimes.in / Jul 23, 2023, 15:19 (IST)

In an interview with the news portal, Tigmanshu Dhulia revealed that the hacker, saked his young assistant for Rs 800 on the pretext that his online payment app was not functioning.

Aadesh Chaudhary: I haven't quit but have taken a break from TV to focus on OTT and films

TNN / Jun 13, 2023, 17:28 (IST)

Television actor Aadesh Chaudhary has taken a short break from television to focus on finding good roles in films and OTT. His motive is to explore further and grow as an actor.

Has Salman Khan rejected the Dabangg 4 script?

etimes.in / Jun 09, 2023, 14:06 (IST)

While fans are waiting for the 'Dabangg' franchise to return, it doesn't look like it's happening anytime soon. As per sources, Salman Khan hasn't really liked the script given by Tigmanshu Dhulia.

In Pics! Aanjjan Srivastav celebrates his 75th birthday in style; friends and colleagues cheer for him

TNN / Jun 04, 2023, 15:43 (IST)

Actor Aanjjan Srivastav celebrated his 75th birthday on June 2 and invited his close friends and family. He had a fun time on his birthday and talked about how he enjoys such get-togethers.
